import Data from"Entites/Data";import{saveAs}from"file-saver";const{name,surname,patronymic,main_number,mail,address}=Data.person;const fullName="".concat(name," ").concat(surname," ").concat(patronymic);function saveVCard(){const vCardContent="
    BEGIN:VCARD
    VERSION:3.0
    FN:".concat(fullName,"
    TEL;TYPE=CELL:").concat(main_number,"
    EMAIL:").concat(mail,"
    ADR:").concat(address,"
    END:VCARD
  ");const blob=new Blob([vCardContent],{type:"text/vcard"});saveAs(blob,"contact.vcf");}export default saveVCard;
